name: South of Market Mental Health Clinic
description: SOMA Mental Health provides psychiatric medication evaluation and management, counseling, clinical case management & support groups. Hours of operation for walk-in intake Monday, Tuesday, Thursday & Friday 8:30 AM - 10:30 AM Wednesday 1 PM - 2:30 PM Gay/lesbian-identified/sensitive staff is available.
